creator: marc.sommer@schlund.de
text:
setting the ACL with a fixed order of ACEs does not
guaranty that you receive the ACEs in that particular order.

I'm using the slidestore.mysql.MySQLDescriptorsStore on JBoss 3.2.1

MySQLDescriptorsStore is no longer supported. Could you please check if this bug
has been fixed by recently merged J2EE/ JDBC store? Thanks in advance :)

text: *** Bug 22001 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
